parameter-group.name: authentication
parameter-group.label: Authentication
parameter-group.description: Information for connection to your Watson Speech-to-Text instance.

parameter.name: apiKey
parameter.label: Api Key
parameter.description: Api key for Speech-to-Text instance created on IBM Cloud.

parameter.name: instanceUrl
parameter.label: Instance Url
parameter.description: Url for Speech-to-Text instance created on IBM Cloud.

parameter.name: preferMultimediaModel
parameter.label: Prefer Multimedia Model
parameter.description: Prefer multimedia to telephony models. Multimedia models are intended for audio that has a minimum sampling rate of 16 kHz, while telephony models are intended for audio that has a minimum sampling rate of 8 kHz.

parameter.name: backgroundAudioSuppression
parameter.label: Background Audio Suppression
parameter.description: Use the parameter to suppress side conversations or background noise.

parameter.name: speechDetectorSensitivity
parameter.label: Speech Detector Sensitivity
parameter.description: Use the parameter to suppress word insertions from music, coughing, and other non-speech events.

parameter.name: maxSilenceSeconds
parameter.label: Max Silence Seconds
parameter.description: The time in seconds after which, if only silence (no speech) is detected in the audio, the connection is closed.

parameter.name: noResultsMessage
parameter.label: No Results Message
parameter.description: Message to be told when no transcription is done.

parameter.name: errorMessage
parameter.label: Error Message
parameter.description: Message to be told when an error has happened.

parameter.name: singleUtteranceMode
parameter.label: Single Utterance Mode
parameter.description: When enabled recognition stops listening after a single utterance.

parameter.name: optOutLogging
parameter.label: Opt Out Logging
parameter.description: By default, all IBM Watsonâ„¢ services log requests and their results. Logging is done only to improve the services for future users. The logged data is not shared or made public.

parameter.name: smartFormatting
parameter.label: Smart Formatting
parameter.description: If true, the service converts dates, times, series of digits and numbers, phone numbers, currency values, and internet addresses into more readable. (Not available for all locales)

parameter.name: redaction
parameter.label: Redaction
parameter.description: If true, the service redacts, or masks, numeric data from final transcripts. (Not available for all locales)
